summary: Dr. Haroldo Drachenberg, a psychiatrist, was disciplined for immoral and unprofessional conduct and sexual misconduct. He engaged in a dating/sexual relationship with a former patient for whom he continued to informally prescribe medications, travel internationally, and provide financial support. His license was reprimanded, suspended for 10 business days, and placed on two years of probation, coupled with a $15,000 fine and mandatory ethics training.
